title: PSA: PBE accounts are now available for all players Honor 3+ and with no current bans

embed.description: We've made a few changes to the Public Beta Environment (PBE), but the most important is that we're linking newly created PBE accounts to your main account. To register, your main account must be in good standing (no current bans) and be honor level 3 or above.
